archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Ecosystem Assurance
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish an enterprise-wide ecosystem assurance policy framework, and an associated operational capability aimed at assuring continual trust for customers and ecosystem partners through application of â€œassurance by designâ€� principles ensuring that new and digital services work from day one and create value.

properties.value: The objective of the Ecosystem Assurance process is to establish an enterprise-wide ecosystem assurance policy framework, and an associated operational capability aimed at assuring continual trust for customers and ecosystem partners through application of â€œassurance by designâ€� principles, ensuring that new and digital services work from day one and create value. Ecosystem Assurance process focusses on providing visibility and traceability of end-to-end digital services, across the partner ecosystem value-chain via enabling and assuring a standardized Open API connectivity, Plug & Play assurance models, multi-way anomaly detection and accurate multi-partner settlement process.
